name: Frozen Dragon Gems
description:
Help your Dragons Battle through Weeds that Grow, Fire Balls, Stones, Ladybirds, Branches, Ice, Jelly, Walls and Blocks.

Frozen Dragon Gems is a spell bounding addictive Match 3 type game, offering 450 levels of increasing difficulty making the game as enjoyable for adults and children alike.

New Duel Mode Levels - Play against AI to win these exciting levels

Help your Dragons Battle through many amazing levels, creating or using many power up’s to help you complete the levels.

Complete the tasks along the way, levels with Score limits, Collection goals, Drop items and Time limits, plus more.

Daily Wheel Bonus.

in Game Language’s : English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, Chinese and Japanese.

If you like Match 3 games, download for free Frozen Dragon Gems now.
